tacos.name: Classic Quesadilla
tacos.description: 6inch open face flour tortilla, filled with mozzarella cheese, onions and cilantro, or add your favorite choice of meat

tacos.name: Quesadilla Grande
tacos.description: A 12inch flour tortilla, filled with mozzarella cheese, pint beans with sides of sour cream, pico de gallo and chips

tacos.name: Vegetarian Quesadilla
tacos.description: A flour tortilla suffed with melted mozzarella cheese, onions, red and green peppers

tacos.name: La Chula
tacos.description: Lard quesadilla in homemade blue corn tortilla, stuffed with grill mix cheese peppers & onions, on side sour cream, pico de gallo with chips
